header.name: Alaa Mousa Hasan
header.title: DevOps & Monitoring Engineer
header.description: DevOps Engineer with strong hands-on experience in automation, monitoring, distributed systems, and cloud-native tooling. Skilled in Prometheus/Grafana, Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation across Windows and Linux environments. Passionate about building reliable systems and end-to-end automation.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: DevOps & Service Engineer focused on automation, monitoring, and distributed systems.

skills.title: Skills
skills.programming: Programming: Python, Bash, PowerShell, C#, JavaScript
skills.softwareTools: Tools: Prometheus, Grafana, Alertmanager, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, GitHub Actions, Proxmox

details.testing: Background in test automation and model-based workflows (Simulink, CANoe, CAPL).
details.systems: Experienced in distributed infrastructure and client-server architectures.
details.modeling: Academic background in signal processing and mathematical modeling (FFT/DFT, Laplace, Z-Transform).

details.1: Designed, deployed, and maintained large-scale monitoring stacks (Prometheus, Grafana, Alertmanager) across 40+ traffic-control sites.
details.2: Automated system provisioning with Terraform, Ansible, and scripting (Bash/Python).
details.3: Developed dashboards, alert rules, exporters, and scraping architectures for distributed Windows/Linux systems.
details.4: Troubleshot infrastructure, network issues, and service outages across production environments.
details.5: Collaborated with internal teams, customer sites, and vendors to ensure system reliability and uptime.

details.1: Developed automated test workflows using Simulink, CANoe, and Python.
details.2: Improved CI/CD processes and build automation for testing systems.
details.3: Worked with distributed test environments, remote agents, and static code analysis tools.
details.4: Contributed to scalable automation frameworks used in system validation.

details.1: Provided IT support, troubleshooting, and system configuration.
details.2: Created small automation tools to optimize internal workflows.
details.3: Performed network setup, laptop configuration, and system maintenance.

details.1: Worked with JavaScript-based testing tools and Cypress.io.
details.3: Collaborated with engineering teams to improve test reliability.

details.1: Focused on embedded systems, automation, and distributed computing.

items.name: Prometheus & Grafana Monitoring Setup
items.description: Configured and maintained monitoring for 40+ distributed Windows/Linux systems. Managed VMs, deployed and supervised Dockerized services using Portainer, and integrated Prometheus, Grafana, and Windows/Linux exporters for full observability.

items.name: B2B Supplier–Restaurant Platform
items.description: Designed and managed a full-stack .NET 8 + React platform. Defined business requirements, planned system architecture, created technical tasks, and implemented authentication, role management, and database models.

items.name: Grafana Dashboards & Alert Rules
items.description: Developed advanced dashboards, variables, templates, and alerting rules for production monitoring across multiple sites.

items.name: Investify – Micro-Investment Platform Concept
items.description: Designed the business and technical concept for a micro-investment platform. Defined requirements, investor flows, subscription model, and MVP roadmap with early market validation.

items.name: Simulink Model Generator
items.description: Developed a parser and automation tool to generate Simulink models from structured Excel sheets to accelerate testing workflows.

items.name: HIL Testing Automation
items.description: Automated system tests using CANoe, CAPL, Python, and Simulink, integrating them into validation workflows.

items.name: Bamboo CI/CD Agent Setup
items.description: Configured and deployed Bamboo build agents for automated CI/CD pipelines supporting builds, tests, and validation stages.

items.name: Network Debugging & Connectivity Troubleshooting
items.description: Analyzed and resolved network-related issues across distributed Windows/Linux systems. Debugged exporter connectivity, firewall restrictions, routing problems, unreachable VMs, and blocked ports. Used traceroute, telnet/netcat, logs, and jump-host access to diagnose and restore system communication.

items.name: Computer Vision Experiments
items.description: Developed early computer vision prototypes using Python and OpenCV, implementing edge detection, thresholding, and feature extraction.

items.name: Python Automation Scripts
items.description: Built automation tools for scraping room availability, sending email alerts, and retrieving weather data via external APIs.

items.name: Weather Forecast Application
items.description: Developed a Python application that fetches and displays real-time weather data using external API requests.

items.name: Interactive Online CV Website
items.description: Built a responsive and multi-language online CV using React, reusable components, routing, animations, and i18n support.

items.name: Multi-Device Communication System (Bachelor Project)
items.description: Developed a microcontroller-to-Android communication system using SPI and serial protocols, enabling synchronized data exchange between embedded hardware and mobile devices.

items.name: Docker Compose Environment Setup
items.description: Created and managed Docker Compose environments for local development and testing. Structured multi-container setups for backend, frontend, databases, and monitoring services.

items.name: Portainer Stack Deployment
items.description: Deployed and managed Docker containers through Portainer, including stack configurations, container upgrades, and monitoring for distributed systems.

items.name: Kubernetes Deployment Demo
items.description: Deployed a frontend and backend application on Kubernetes using deployments, services, and namespaces. Tested scaling, service routing, and container orchestration on a K3s cluster.

items.name: Terraform & Ansible Automation Lab
items.description: Created small infrastructure-as-code experiments using Terraform for provisioning and Ansible for configuration automation on Linux/Windows systems.

items.name: Interactive Online Resume
items.description: A responsive web-based CV built using React, JS, and modular components.

items.name: Monitoring Automation Scripts
items.description: Scripts for automating Prometheus exporters and service checks.

items.name: Infrastructure-as-Code Lab
items.description: Terraform and Ansible automation for learning and production use cases.

items.name: Legacy Python Projects
items.description: Early automation tools including weather forecasting, scraping, and email alerts.
